items.title: Wari
items.description: Door mounted Magic Corner, easily store and access use for corner cabinets. Possible in both a left or right setup. The “LS-WARI” uses a single action to open, with options in colours for the baskets, Grey, White, Maple and Chrome.

items.title: Flex
items.description: Cabinet secured Magic Corner, easily store and access use for corner cabinets. Possible in both a left or right setup. The “LS-FLEX” uses a two step opening action, with options in colours for the baskets, Grey, White, Maple and Chrome. All 4 baskets can completely come out of the cabinet.

specifications.title: Includes:
specifications.content: 4 Baskets, 2 for door of a max. load of 8kg (18lbs) each, 2 for cabinet of a max. load of 9.5kg (21lbs) each

specifications.title: Includes:
specifications.content: 4 Baskets, max. load of 8kg (17.5 lbs) each basket

notes.title: Baskets
notes.content: not attached to door do not come of cabinet without un-clicking them

notes.title: Handles
notes.content: can interfere with the slide out motion, ensure the handles on cabinet to the left or right doesn’t stick out more then ??
